title: Move To-Do Actions column to far left and remove overtime date format example text

requirements.text: Move the entire “Actions” column in the To-Do tasks table to be the leftmost column (header + all row cells), instead of being the rightmost column.

quotes: The actions column should be all the way on the left instead of the right side.

acceptanceCriteria: In the To-Do table header, the “Actions” <th> renders as the first (leftmost) column header.
For each To-Do table row, the cell containing the Edit/Done buttons renders as the first (leftmost) cell in that row.
All existing button behaviors remain unchanged (Edit opens edit dialog; Done opens mark-done dialog).
No other columns’ data/content is changed; only the column order is updated.

requirements.text: Remove the date input example/helper paragraph under the overtime date input (delete it with no replacement).
acceptanceCriteria: The helper text paragraph under the overtime Date field is no longer rendered.
The Date input field remains present and continues to validate DD-MM-YYYY as before.
No new helper text is added in place of the removed paragraph.

constraints: Apply changes only to the two selected UI elements: (1) the helper paragraph under the overtime date field, and (2) the To-Do table “Actions” column (header + corresponding cells).
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change backend APIs, task/overtime data models, or persistence.
Do not change validation rules or date formatting logic for overtime beyond removing the helper paragraph.
Do not redesign the To-Do table styling beyond what is necessary to support the column reorder.
